title: Modular grid system
description:
The Creator Board is composed of 3 primary boards: Work board, Nano pad, and Loop pad, which all bring different levels of utility to your workflow.

Thanks to the modular grid system of the base plate, you can arrange and add new component in the way that fits you best.

title: SUPERIOR ERGONOMIC SUPPORT

RAZER‚Ñ¢ HYPERSPEED WIRELESS
description: Powered by industry-leading wireless technology, enjoy fast, reliable performance that gives you more work freedom and efficiency while keeping your workspace clean and cable-free. With a wireless dongle designed to connect both your wireless mouse and keyboard, you can streamline your setup even further and free up a USB port on your PC or laptop for other devices.

title: Ultra compact.
description: By stretching size and performance beyond reasonable limits, Devialet engineers have brought to life Phantom II: the only ultra-compact home sound system capable of delivering high fidelity and physical impact, whatever the volume.

title: Revolutionary circuit

title: Ultra-low self-noise
description: The puristic signal path is completely free from semiconductors and capacitors to achieve an ultra-low noise floor of only 7 dB (A).
